meanings.definition: To strike with a sudden and loud noise, as if by thunder.
meanings.sent1: The thunderstriking sound of the drum echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent2: The lightning was followed by a thunderstriking boom.
meanings.sent3: The cat's paws made a thunderstriking noise on the wooden floor.
meanings.sent4: Her words thunderstruck him like a sudden storm.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstriking crash of the cymbals marked the end of the performance.

meanings.sent1: The fireworks display was truly thunderstriking.
meanings.sent2: The sudden appearance of the magician was thunderstriking.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so delicious, it was almost thunderstriking.
meanings.sent4: Her beauty was as thunderstriking as a bolt of lightning.
meanings.sent5: The news of the victory was met with thunderstriking cheers from the crowd.
